user_question: How can I make my home more sustainable and generate an image of a sustainable home design?
final_answer: To make your home more sustainable, consider installing solar panels, using energy-efficient appliances, implementing rainwater harvesting systems, and improving insulation. Image of a sustainable home design generated. Sustainable materials for home construction include bamboo, reclaimed wood, recycled steel, and sheep's wool insulation.
